archimate:Goal.name: Process Automation and AI implementation in all INFUSE departments
archimate:Goal.documentation:
We are fighting on a tough battlefield with AI being widely introduced and used in many industries in the world, especially in companies where digital channels are a dominant source of revenue. With so many tools and information available online in our environment, we expect our teams to use the most contemporary tools and sources available for lead information verification and product delivery. THIS IS A MUST.
OUR CLIENTS EXPECT MORE than ever before and at the same time are willing to pay much less! Our competitors are finding ways to lower their production costs as much as 10 times with AI being implemented across all their key functions! To stay competitive and grow, our processes need to drastically improve NOW. To be in the top 3 Demand Gen companies in the World INFUSEâ€™s teams need to go above and beyond in new technologies and AI implementation.
